ValidationRule.description: If UC Connection Method is GM Desktop App or Mobile App other fields are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), ( ISPICKVAL(Phone_Device_Type__c,'GM Desktop App') || ISPICKVAL(Phone_Device_Type__c,'Mobile Device') ), ( ISBLANK( GM_App_Version__c ) || ISBLANK( Mobile_OS__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: GM App Version and Computer/Mobile OS are required if UC Connection Method is GM Desktop App or Mobile App
